review_title: A huge learning block for me! Fantastic for development
pros: Leadership I thought were fantastic - certainly cared about staff and the services they delivered. The work felt really meaningful to me and felt like I was making a different in what I done.
cons: Genuinely have no cons for BCHG.

review_title: No value for employees, no equality
job_title: Information Technology in Rowley Regis, England
pros: Offers some flexibility, however very limited dependent on your department.
cons: No value for their employees, no appreciation for hard work. Many employees have been forced to leave the jobs due to poor salary. Discriminative behaviour from higher management. Showing favouritism when pleases them. No regard for their employees opinions and requests.

job_title: Customer Relationship Officer in Blackheath, England
pros: Good working conditions but a bit controlling.
cons: Very rigid structure and not very flexible.

pros: good communication and lovely staff with their heads screwed on!
cons: a little bit hit and miss with their Rota systems and a lot of staff go off sick (mostly the same ones consistently) but nothing's done about those that abuse the system and lay the workload on those like me who get on with it

job_title: Trainee Accountant in Rowley Regis, England
pros: Fantastic place to work that offers loads of support when needed! Work done well is recognised and rewarded.
cons: Attitude towards flexible working isn't always great.. better for some departments than others.

pros: None at all, ran very poorly
cons: All, never paid properly, problems are never dealt with, residents treated poorly, management dont know what they are doing.
